description: This file is a React component named 'Hero' that renders a prominent promotional section with animated entrance effects, styled with Tailwind CSS, including headings, text, call-to-action buttons, and decorative SVG elements. It manages interactivity like smooth scrolling to page anchors.

methods.name: Hero()
methods.description: React functional component rendering a hero section with animation and interactivity.
